input.sentences: we took a group picture before the event .
my wife was very happy to be present .
the cake was magnificent and white .
my brother wore a yellow shirt and tie .
the bride and groom both wore white .
output.sentences: I was happy to get the best picture at Sonia's event.
My bosses wife also went, and for that I was happy.
There was a white, magnificent cake set  aside for those of us who weren't actually part of the wedding.
Yellow was the color of the shirt Sonia's brother wore, and for once a tie!
Naturally, Sonia wore white, and only the groom knew that it was in symbol only.
